message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair and simple start!
You rejected my share, now it's my turn to propose a better deal!
Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50. It's a fair and reasonable proposal!
You want 50? I'll give you 20, but I'm taking the lion's share this time!
I'll give you a slightly larger share this time. Let's split it 40/60 and see if we can come to an agreement!
You're still trying to lowball me? I'll take 15, but I'm the one making the offer now!
I'll give you a slightly larger share again. Let's split it 35/65 and see if we can finally come to an agreement!
You're not getting any more generous? I'll take 10, but I'm the one calling the shots now!
I'm not going to give you the whole pie, but I'll give you a decent share. Let's split it 25/75 and see if you'll accept!
You're not even trying to negotiate fairly. I'll take 5, but I'm not going to let you get away with this!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to negotiate further.
Fine, you want to play it tough? I'll take 99, and you can have the last $1. It's the best I can do!
